value:
$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|This is it. We have arrived. You all
worked hard to get here.$k$pAt this, the root of the World-Tree
Yggdrasill, we can now perform
the Rite of Opening.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The Rite of Opening...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Yes, but you need not worry.
I will perform the rite.$k$pAs long as I have mortals who have
asked me for my help, I can perform
the Rite of Opening for them.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|You are welcome to rest and
recover as you please.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Is there no way we can—$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|Lord Askr, although the power at my
disposal is very little next to yours,
please allow me to help you.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Your kind wish to join me is more
than enough, Ash. If you joined me,
the rite would cost you your power.$k$pBesides, you have your own role
to play, no? Protect the Order of
Heroes in my stead.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|U-understood, Lord Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|With that, I will get started. Although
such stuffy rituals are not my favorite,
it is work that must be done.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|By the power of opening, I, Askr,
bestow a gift upon the people.$k$pIn my name, the name of the people,
and for the good of the nine realms...$k$pI grant this key so that the mortals
may use it to free themselves from
the dark enclosure...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$Fi2000|$EFace_Smile|With that, I present...the World-Key
of Yggdrasill. Take it, Alfonse.$k$p$bEvBG_OP_00_v0608b|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|It's...a fruit?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|That's right. Those who have fallen
under Embla's control need only eat
of this fruit.$k$pIf such a person truly wishes for
their freedom...Yggdrasill will grant
them that wish as they die.$k$pInstead, their bodies will recover,
fully healed, and their hearts will be
lifted from Embla's grip.$k$pAnd if Embla refuses to release her
hold, she will perish instead.$k$pLike the darkness of Embla was
like a poison to me, the light of
Yggdrasill will drive out the dark.$k$p$bEvBg_YggdrasillAsk|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Using this, then, it's possible to both
stop her from possessing others and
deliver a final blow at the same time.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Yes. And Midgard—your world—will
be rid of the darkness that plagues
it as well.$k$pI will leave the choice of how to wield
it in your hands.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Lord Askr...$k$p...Zacharias?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Eating of this fruit is enough to free
one from Embla's control...$k$p$EFace_Smile|This is a power I have been seeking
for a very long time. I never imagined
I would ever find it...$k$pWith this, I can now see the light at
the end of Embla's long darkness.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|As can I. We must use the fact that
she does not know of this key to
our advantage.$k$pI'm sure we can come up with a
plan if we work together—you, me,
and $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Excuse me... Please forgive my
interruption, but I sense a dark
presence coming this way...$k$pI believe Embla's retainer will arrive
here momentarily. Although, I admit
that I cannot be entirely certain...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Well, well... And just what is it you
lot think you're doing? Scheming?$k$p$EFace_Cool|I suppose you refuse to tell me...
No matter—you'll all be dead
soon enough!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_12,0|$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|With Embla's retainer defeated,
he will be forced to retreat, which
means we must go on the offensive.$k$pIf we follow him, he is sure to lead
us to Embla. I will open the way
forward she has closed.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Let's hurry after him! If we don't,
we'll lose line of sight on him!$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I wish I could join you, but I must
remain here for now. The rite has
exhausted me, and I need to rest.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Of course. Thank you for everything,
Lord Askr. We will not let you down.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|The thought that you might had not
even crossed my mind. Now, get
after him—and good luck!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Right! Let's go, everyone!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|...They've gone. The best of luck
to you, Heroes.$k$pAs for me, it seems my time has
grown rather short...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|Lord Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Ah, Ash... You should hurry along
with the others, or you will be left
behind. We can't have that...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Though I am but your retainer, and
am not worthy of what you have
done for me...I must speak.$k$pI can sense the power of the light
within your heart.$k$pBut now...it feels...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Do not worry, Ash. From the moment
I stepped into Embla's darkness, this
moment became inevitable.$k$pI do not fare well in darkness. I have
always preferred the open air, the
light, and the joy they bring...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Disappear,Face|But every meeting must one day
beget a parting.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|No, Lord Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Disappear,Face|Ash... Since you are here, I do have
one favor to ask of you.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Y-yes... Of course, Lord Askr!
I will do whatever is within my
ability—whatever you ask.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Disappear,Face|Seeing Alfonse and the others, I kept
reflecting on how beautiful the bonds
between mortals are.$k$pThe way they care for each other
is something to cherish.$k$pTheir friendship...camaraderie...
They are a family.$k$pYou are my family, Ash. You...are
my only daughter, whom I love.$k$p$EFace_Smile|So I was hoping...you would indulge
me one last request... Will you...
remember me like a father?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|B-but...surely to think of myself
as your daughter would be a
dishonor to you, and I would not—$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Disappear,Face|Ash. You do not dishonor me.
I am proud of you...my daughter.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|No... I-it is too...too...$k$p$EFace_Blush2|...$k$p...Father? Is that...all right?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Disappear,Face|Yes, Ash. It is all right. Thank you.
But you may refer to me however
you wish—as would any daughter.$k$pFathers wish only for their children
to be happy...$k$pI want you to be happy, Ash.
Keep the light in your heart.$k$p$EFace_Smile|It is what I hope to always see...
from where I now...must go...$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi3000|...$k$p$EFace_Cry|...$k$pF-Father... *sob*$k$p$Sbs150|
